title: T3 Keeler Kleinow Rucker For Sale
author: Brailey

posts.post_title: T3 Keeler Kleinow Rucker For Sale
posts.post_content:
3 T3's for sale.  All have checklist backs.

T3 Keeler NY Nat'l - Presents nicely, no paper loss or pin holes.  Cut about 3/16" short top to bottom.  $500

T3 Kleinow NY Amer. - Great looking catcher's pose.  A couple pinholes top center and some disturbances lower left in border.  Presents very nicely.  $200

T3 Rucker Brooklyn - Pinhole top center, a water stain in upper right corner within border.  Presents nicely.  $180

Please contact me for scans at [url]mikebrailey@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks,
Mike
